definition: abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: But to the folks, there are seldom experts or scholars of their own, not to mention consultants or advisers.
sentences.chinese: 只是民众却少有属于自己的专家学者，遑论顾问智囊。

sentences.english: I actually don't know any high school dropouts, let alone any successful ones.
sentences.chinese: 其实，我不知道任何高辍学，更遑论任何成功的。

sentences.english: He seldom faces protests, let alone investigating magistrates.
sentences.chinese: 布莱尔很少面临着抗议，更遑论调查官了。

sentences.english: Pls mention the catagory of design while contacting me.
sentences.chinese: 请遑论设计类，而我联系。

sentences.english: They are safe and effective, not to mention hypoallergenic.
sentences.chinese: 他们是安全和有效，更遑论过敏性。

sentences.english: The Greek economy is just 2% of European GDP and an even tinier proportion of global GDP.
sentences.chinese: 它的国内生产总值仅占欧洲2%，遑论全球了。

sentences.english: Mr. A does not know basic English sentences, not to speak of writing a good composition.
sentences.chinese: 先生连基本英语句子都不懂，遑论写篇好文章。

sentences.english: Broadcast domestic animation market, after years of weakness, not to mention its derivatives.
sentences.chinese: 国内的动画播映市场，积弱经年，更遑论其衍生产品。

definition: let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
so much so that/to the extent that/even
down to/up to/to such an extent as to .../also written 以至於|以至于[yi3 zhi4 yu2]
I would like to ask (usually used rhetorically)/one might well ask
hard to say/can't guarantee/difficult to protect/difficult to preserve
impossible/can't be done/no can do/unable to accomplish
